name: Melanie Scrofano
description:
A request by @Zorglub. Melanie Scrofano is a Canadian actress, having starred in series such as Wynonna Earp, Bad Blood and more recently in Star Trek: Strange New Worlds

The embed has been trained on SD 1.5 and works well on most 1.5 based models. Occassionally on certain models birthmarks can appear on her neck. Negative prompting largely prevents this, but inpainting always solves the issue.

If you enjoy my creations and want to support me or have a face you'd like to commission, consider supporting me on Ko-Fi or Buy Me A Coffee :)
